about_the_game:
Enter the world of Hillbilly Hellfire, a brutal third-person tower defense game where you step into the boots of Skeeter—a grizzled, hillbilly tasked with defending a sacred relic against relentless demon hordes. Armed with a heavenly handgun and an array of divine defenses, Skeeter must survive wave after wave of hellish invaders, determined to destroy the holy relic hidden across the USA.

When an angel appears, Skeeter finds himself wielding supernatural firepower and turrets to push back the forces of hell. Every wave tests your skill and strategy as you recapture souls from fallen enemies to strengthen your arsenal. Upgrade Skeeter’s firepower, restore health and repair, and summon defenses between rounds. The handcrafted open maps have multiple attack vectors and will test your strategy and responsiveness.

Intense Tower Defense Action with Challenging Enemies

Each map is a hardcore survival challenge. Use careful aim and strategic turret placements to protect the relic against escalating waves of skeleton warriors, hellhounds, and mighty demons. The skeletons attack in swarms, hellhounds strike fast, and the towering demons bring devastating power, forcing you to adapt your strategy with every round.

Key Features:

  • Third-Person Tower Defense: Protect the holy relic across rugged open landscapes filled with chokepoints and strategic opportunities.

  • Third-Person Shooter: Put your shooter skills to the test, demanding precision, quick reflexes, and tactical awareness. Your success hinges on your ability to adapt, and position yourself strategically. This blend of shooter mechanics and active defense ensures that players are constantly at the center of the fight, making every encounter a test of skill and endurance.

  • Varied Enemy Types: Scatter waves of skeletons, put down hellhounds, and banish powerful demons, each with unique attack patterns and strengths.

  • Heavenly Upgrades: Recapture souls to upgrade your heavenly handgun, purchase healing, and deploy different types of divine turrets, from area-effect cannons to high-damage long rand single-shot guns.

Dynamic Challenges and Adaptive Strategy

Face shifting challenges as enemy waves grow stronger and adapt to your defenses. Choose how to spend your resources carefully—whether upgrading your weapons, healing Skeeter, or reinforcing your defenses with turrets. Each decision shapes the tide of battle, making every wave a new test of your survival instincts and tactical planning.

Will Skeeter overcome the forces of the underworld and protect the holy relics, or will hell itself take the mountains? Jump into Hillbilly Hellfire and put your survival skills to the ultimate test.

Recommended:

short_description: Defend a holy relic in this third-person tower defense repelling waves of hellspawn using divine intervention and a bit of hillbilly ingenuity. Charge headfirst into fierce battles, outsmarting twisted foes with quick decisions, explosive turrets, and precision gunplay as you claim victory!
